src:
UFC 244 live stream: Diaz vs Masvidal official early weigh ins video
01 Nov 2019, 13:01 by Anton Tabuena



UFC hosts another PPV event at Madison Square Garden in New York, and it will be headlined by a BMF title bout between Nate Diaz and Jorge Masvidal. The co-main event will be a middleweight debut of Darren Till, who will be facing fellow former title contender Kelvin Gastelum.
Watch ‘UFC 244 - ‘MASVIDAL VS DIAZ’ Stream all the fights broadcast LIVE — don’t miss a single second of face-punching action! Plus, you get access to the best of the UFC Archives & more! GET THE FIGHTS!
The rest of the card is pretty stacked as well, but before any of them can be made official, they first have to tip the scales at their contracted weights.
The early — and official — weigh ins are live, and you can watch it on the live stream below.
The ceremonial weigh ins happens later in the day, and can be streamed at 5 p.m. ET here:



The full UFC 244 card is as follows:
Jorge Masvidal vs. Nate Diaz
Kelvin Gastelum vs. Darren Till
Stephen Thompson vs. Vicente Luque
Derrick Lewis vs. Blagoy Ivanov
Kevin Lee vs. Gregor Gillespie
Corey Anderson vs. Johnny Walker
Shane Burgos vs. Makwan Amirkhani
Brad Tavares vs. Edmen Shahbazyan
Andrei Arlovski vs. Jairzinho Rozenstruik
Katlyn Chookagian vs. Jennifer Maia
Lyman Good vs. Chance Rencountre
Julio Arce vs. Hakeem Dawodu
In This Stream

UFC 244: Masvidal vs. Diaz previews, predictions, coverage, odds, more



UFC 244 Embedded, part 5 - ‘I will show him what is exciting’


UFC 244 live stream: Diaz vs Masvidal official early weigh ins video


Derrick Lewis says he’s not cutting weight ahead of UFC 244
